text:
6
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.

Imports of Timber, &c.
LONDON
(From April 17th to May 1st.)
April 17th. Primrose (s) @ Riga,—5,555 sleepers, 533 ½ sleepers, Order. Christiana @ Drammen,—146 doz. battens, C. J. Im Thurn & Co. ; 1,062 doz. battens, A. Pelly & Co. ; 5,487 pcs. battens, Tagart, Boysen, & Co. Christiana @ Christiania,—110 fms. firewood, With & Co. (part of deck cargo washed overboard). Svea @ Christiania,—208 fms. firewood, Dahl & Sadler. Amelia @ Saunesund,—227 fms. firewood, Duus, Brown, & Co. (about 15 fms. thrown overboard). Cecilia @ Fredrikstad,—176 fms. firewood, Erlundsen. Haabets Anker @ Fredrikstad,—3,409 deals, 41,975 pcs. boards, 7,077 staves, Tagart & Co. Tonsberg @ Fredrikstad,—28,899 pcs. flooring boards, 190 bdls. laths, R. H. Dahl & Co.
April 18th. Gwalia @ Christiania,—5,107 spars and masts, W. Cossery. Try @ Drammen,—724 doz. battens, 3,871 doz. boards, Tagart & Co. Fosnes @ Fredrikstad,—114 fms. firewood, J. Neck & Son. Agnar @ Drammen,—207 fms. firewood, 1 fm. edgings, 4 fms. slabs, With & Co. Earl of Shaftesbury @ Skien,—203 fms. firewood, J. Neck & Son. Henry @ Sarpsborg,—168 fms. firewood, With & Co. Parr @ Christiania,—22 fms. firewood, J. Neck & Son. Cora @ Dram,—2,621 battens, Nansen. Charles Northcote @ Gothenburg,—12 logs and 25 t. mahogany, 6,011 spars and m'sts, C. G. Graham & Co. Sophie @ Christiania,—25,199 boards, 8 fms. firewood, G. Schofield. Isabella @ Christiania,—412 logs mahogany and cedar, With, Webster, & Co.
April 21st. Strang @ Dram,—322 doz. battens, J. Neck & Son; 390 doz. battens, J. C. Im Thurn & Co.
April 22nd. Atalanta @ Memel,—805 pcs. timber, 59 pcs. ends, 735 logs mahogany and cedar, Murietta & Co.
April 23rd. Martha @ Sannesund,—130 fms, firewood, W. Hope. Lion @ Helga,—657 pcs. mahogany, G. F. Neame & Co.
April 24th. Nachimoff (s) @ Odessa,—347 wainscot logs, 17,120 oak staves, J. Leonino & Co.
April 25th. Cosmopolitan (s) @ Hambro,—370 pcs. timber, Uthoff & Co. Columbia @ Jamaica,—81 t. logwood, J. Thomson & Co. Daisy (s) @ Riga,—3,850 pcs. lathwood, Order.
April 27th. Albion (s) @ Christiania,—182,874 staves, Duus, Brown, & Co. ; 4,886 boards, 254 battens, 194 deals, G. E. Arnold & Co. ; 290 cs. wood pulp, 23,676 boards, Order. New World @ New York,—185 logs mahogany, Farnworth & Co. Jane Emily @ Falmouth Jamaica,—81 t. logwood, 47 t. fustic, 2 t. lignum vitæ, 312 lancewood spars, 1 pc. mahogany, S. Dobree & Sons. Oscar @ Drontheim,—98 893 pcs. deals and battens, J. Neck & Son. Svea @ Honduras,—798 pcs. mahogany, 150 t. logwood, Young, Harrison.
April 28th. Alette @ Memel,—1,524 pcs. timber, P. Rolt & Co.; 8,329 staves, Order. Passaroeang @ Memel,—915 pcs. 6r timber, P. Rolt & Co. ; 11,073 staves, Order. Lillie (s) @ Warberg,—6 pcs. oak timber, P. wood, Churchill & Sim. Rubenovitch @ Danzig,—900 pcs. timber, 13,000 staves, Order.
April 29th. Star @ Windau,—1,726 pcs. square sleepers, 220 pcs. ½ square sleepers, T. Gabriel & Sons. Pansy (s) @ Riga,—8,482 sleeper blocks, Order. Helen Campbell @ Port Royal, 12 logs satinwood, 35,722 oak staves, 40 bdls. cane wood, Order.
April 30th. Renan @ Fredrikshald,—822 bdls. architraves, 26,139 boards, 1,847 bdls. mouldings, Tagart, Boyson & Co. ; 12 fms. firewood, Duus, Brown, & Co. Nautilus (s) @ Stockholm,—2,584 pcs. joinery, H. Atkinson. Westerbotten @ Fredrikstad,—139 fms. firewood, Duus, Brown, & Co. Sverre @ Fredrikshal,—240 fms. firewood, Duus, Brown, & Co. Edmund Kaye @ Pensacola,—766 pcs. timber, 554 pcs. deals, Crow, Bogart, & Co. Matfen @ Windau,—2,819 sleepers, 354 ½-sleepers, Order. Tenaco @ Krageroe,—143 fms. firewood, J. Neck & Sons. Gem of the Nith @ Danzig,—2,778 pcs. oak staves, Churchill & Sim; 4,152 ps. sleepers,

MAY 2, 1874.
742 ½-sleepers, Order.
Besides the above there were also imported in various vessels: 652½ fms. firewood, 10,480 staves, 2 blds., 1,350 pcs. sandal wood, 30 bdls. corkwood, 4,500 treenails (Sydney), &c.
LIVERPOOL.
April 16th. Mert @ Fredrikstad,—30,119 boards, Coltart & Co.
April 17th. Frey @ Dram,—36,859 boards, Hughes & Co. Vestalinden @ Fredrikstad,—4,295 pcs. boards, 1,389 bdls. laths, Order. Freya @ Buvig,—43 spars, 741 pcs. battens, 1,281 pcs. timber, Moss & Co. Admiral Prinz Adalbert @ Pensacola,—593 t logwood, Order. Louise @ Christiania,—1,050 pcs. deals, Crow & Co. Falks @ Jamaica,—503 pcs. timber, 3,297 pit props, Hughes & Co. Sacola,—6,381 pcs. timber, 650 pcs. battens, Order. Solon @ Fredrikstad,—39,713 pcs. boards, 9,096 battens, 51 cs. mouldings, 24,917 pcs. skirtings, 1,167 bdls. laths, Coltart & Co.
April 18th. Indiana @ Fredrikstad,—63 cs. moulding and architraves, 62,863 pcs. boards, 1,225 pcs. battens, 970 pcs. battens, Order. Ludvig @ Fredrikstad,—32,801 pcs. boards, 22,491 pcs. pit props, Order. Emanuel @ Gothenburg,—99 t. 24 bgs. boxwood, Order.
April 20th. Karen @ Christiania,—26,798 pit props, Nickelsen @ Christiania,—3,853 pcs. timber, 6 std. staves, Order. Thrudvang @ West Indies,—369 spars, 130 t. logwood, 252 pcs. wood, 7,660 pcs. boards, Farnworth & Co. Ida @ Fredrikstad,—87,383 logs mahogany, 22 log ends, 370 pcs. Indian (s) @ West Indies,—1,043 pcs. timber, 125 pcs. wood. Magnet @ Minatitlan,—147 pcs. spars, 1,299,963 pcs. deals, 766 pcs. staves, Coltart, Smith & Co. Alexander Keith @ St. John, N.B.,—17,925 pcs. deals, &c., 1,302 pcs. scantlings, 1,334 pcs. deal ends, 500 pcs. palings, Farnworth & Co. (deck load lost). Thyra @ Gothenburg,—3,432 pcs. timber, 49,862 pcs. pit props, Order. Australia @ Halifax,—10,627 pcs. deals, 766 pcs. ends, 598 pcs. battens, 460 bdls. palings, 508 pcs. timber, Order. Trinidad (s) @ Constantinople,—118 t. boxwood. Tiger @ Pensacola,—752 pcs. timber, 308 pcs. deals, Order.
April 22nd. Prussian (s) @ Portland,—280 pcs. oak, Order. Garibaldi @ Pensacola,—528 pcs. timber, 848 pcs. deals, Order.
April 23rd. Alfred @ Jamaica,—376 t. sc. logwood, Order. Odin @ Memel,—75 pcs. wainscot, 5,000 staves, 1,086 pcs. timber, Order.
April 25th.—John Pardew @ St. John, N. B., 9,500 pcs. palings, 8,850 pcs. deals, Carvill & Son. Jannetje @ Darien,—250 pcs. plank, 454 pcs. timber, Bland & Co. Lydia @ Darien,—489 pcs. timber, 176 pcs. deals, Crow & Co. Talwin @ Doboy,—377 pcs. timber, 179 pcs. deals, 300 staves, Order.
April 27th.—Alexandria @ Savannah,—340 lgs. timber, 37 pcs. beam fillings, 161 planks, 19 t. dyewood. Tea @ New York,—44 t. fustic, 11 t. lignum vitæ, 61 lgs. dyewood, 1,755 pcs. staves, Order.
April 27th.—Alexandria @ Savannah,—340 lgs. timber, 37 pcs. beam fillings, 161 planks, 19 t. dyewood. Tea @ New York,—44 t. fustic, 11 t. lignum vitæ, 61 lgs. dyewood, 1,755 pcs. staves, Order. Ocean Phantom @ East Pascagoula,—361 pcs. timber, 766 pcs. deals, Order. Schelde @ Christiania,—71,576 pcs. boards, 151 pcs. battens, 144 pcs. spars, Order. J. H. Henckes @ St. Domingo,—669 lgs. lignum vitæ, 301 logs fustic, 275 logs mahogany, 152 logs and 19 mahogany crotches, Sundry Consignees. Atlantic @ Fredrikstad,—85,924 pcs. boards, 139 bdls. laths, Coltart & Co. Oriole @ Gaboon,—79,000 billets barwood, 2,390 billets ebony.
April 28th. Viola @ Fredrikstad,—56,505 pcs. boards, 11,500 pcs. staves, Coltart & Co.
Besides the above there were also imported in various vessels 29,507 staves, 331 bdls. corkwood, 4,096 pcs. sapanwood, &c.
HULL.
April 16th. Hanna @ Drammen,—339 c. boards, 31 c. battens. William @ Arendal,—1,755 pcs. timber, 580 pit props, 1 fm. firewood. Frithyoff @ Brevig,—1,350 pcs. timber, 343 pit props, 72 battens. China @ Wyburg,—108 c. deals, &c. Baldur @ Krageroe,—2,659 pcs. timber, 1,846 pit props. Helene @ Memel,—3,000 staves. Cathinca @ Porsgrund,—4,142 pcs. timber, 1,241 pcs. props. Criminal Rath Brandt @ Memel,—262 c. boards, 490 pcs. lathwood, 261 pcs. timber.
April 17th. Dannebrog @ Skien,—71 c. boards. Odin @ Arendal,—3,792 pcs. timber, 600 pit props. Eidsvold @ Arendal,—1,841 pcs. timber, 1,638 pit props. Thule @ Porsgrund,—5,783 pcs. timber, 2,641 pit props. Louis @ Stettin,—341 pcs. timber. Valkyrien @ Fredrikstad,—4,980 pcs. timber. Gustav @ Stettin,—382 pcs. timber, 524 pcs. lathwood. Emma Malem @ Memel,—28 c. deals, 2,400 staves. Bertha @ Stettin,—566 pcs. timber. Pallas @ Krageroe,—3,808 pcs. timber, 1,361 pit props. Mayneton @ Arendal,—1,548 pcs. timber, 70 c. deals, &c. Aphrodite @ Memel,—76 pcs. oak timber, 1,420 staves, 45 c. deals, &c. Rudolph @ Stettin,—375 pcs. timber. Lily @ Porsgrund,—4,467 pcs. timber, 3,216 pcs. clog soles. Albion @ Gothenburg,—99 c. deals, &c. Emily @ Christiansand,—5,862 pcs. timber, 2,315 pit props. Dei Gratia @ Skien,—246 c. deals. Kong Oscar @ Porsgrund,—4,962 pcs. timber, 19,228 pit props. Kongsberg @ Fredrikstad,—310 c. boards. Gideon @ Gefle,—123 c. deals, &c.
April 18th. Gumple @ Arendal,—49 c. deals, &c., 11,795 props, 8 fms. firewood. Herodot @ Stettin,—592 pcs. timber. Melangen @ Krageroe, 1,641 pcs. timber.
